title: Charlotte Dawson hits back at trolls commenting on her post-baby body
description: The daughter of late comedian Les Dawson, 32, welcomed her third baby, Gigi Dawson Sarsfield, in March.
content:
Charlotte Dawson has hit back at trolls who have told her she is the 'biggest she's ever been' as the reality star opened up about her post-partum weight gain.

The daughter of late comedian Les Dawson, 32, welcomed her third baby, Gigi Dawson Sarsfield, in March.

The star has been open about her weight over the years, and how her body has changed after each of her three pregnancies with sons Noah, four, and Jude, one, and daughter Gigi, four months.

Taking to Instagram on Sunday, Charlotte promoted her Belleh Blaster plan with a weight comparison post.

She shared a before-and-after snap of her body where she could be seen slimmed down following the birth of Noah on the left.

Meanwhile, on the right, Charlotte could be seen shaking her body, as she admitted she's been in 'no rush' to lose the weight.

She wrote: 'Send help! No wait - that’s me! I’ve done it before guys - twice. After Noah and Jude but this time is definitely going to be the hardest.

'As so many people have kindly pointed out I’m the biggest I’ve ever been after having my gorgeous Gigi.

'But I’ve not been in a rush to lose the weight - I’ve had a few other things on my plate! (Apart from chips & graveh!)'

Charlotte continued: 'But I’m back on my fabulous Belleh Blaster plan and I would LOVE your support and inspo to keep me going.. So if you need to shift a bit of timber too please join me on my journey.

'Just go to bellehblaster.com or click the chuffin link above and let’s get dead sexeh togevs - dancing round our living rooms and having a right laff.

'PLUS eating gorgeous proper grub. You know you want to! There is something for everyone you look forward to doing it instead of dreading it!! And we have 50% OFF all plans don’t miss out !'

It comes days after Charlotte took to social media to promote her Dawsylicious Tanning range amid her financial difficulties.

According to documents on Companies House, the reality star's business is facing a £88,000 tax bill and issued an appointment of voluntary liquidation in May.

Charlotte co-owns the wholesale clothing and footwear brand with her fiancé Matt Sarsfield. She is also known to have a separate tanning brand, Dawsylicious Tanning.

The star promoted the brand in the new clip, where she confidently danced in her garden in a bright two-piece.

Alongside the clip, she penned: 'Ps yes I know I’m chunkeh but funkeh but im appeh x this is your sign to show you to wear that damn bikini x.'

Charlotte and Matt managed to patch up their relationship last year after the news broke of the former rugby player's sexting scandal.

And now the couple, who share sons Noah, four, and Jude, 20 months and daughter Gigi, two months, must face their financial problems together.

Documents show the company has £15,000 in assets, reducing her debts to an estimated deficit of £73,300.

Since starting the business in May 2020, Dawsylicious has been issued three strike notices, the most recent being in April 2024.

Her accounts were due by February 29, 2024 and her confirmation statement was due on June 2, 2024. Both are marked as overdue.

Dawsylicious is Charlotte's only limited company listed on Companies House and is described as a wholesale of clothing and footwear.

She also has her separate tanning brand, Dawsylicious Tanning.

DailyMail contacted Charlotte's representatives for comment at the time.
summary: Charlotte Dawson, the daughter of late comedian Les Dawson, has defended her post-partum weight gain following comments that she is the 'biggest she's ever been' on social media. She shared a before-and-after snap of her body, showing her slimming down following the birth of her third child. The reality star also promoted her Belleh Blaster plan with a weight comparison post. This comes amid Charlotte's financial difficulties, with her business facing a £88,000 tax bill and an appointment of voluntary liquidation in May. She co-owns the wholesale clothing and footwear brand Dawsylicious with fiancé Matt Sarsfield and has a separate tanning brand.
shortSummary: Charlotte Dawson criticized trolls for her post-baby weight gain, while promoting her Belleh Blaster plan and tackling financial issues in her Dawsylicious tanning business.

Charlotte Dawson hit back at cruel trolls who have been telling her to lose her post-partum weight in a new clip.
The daughter of comedian Les Dawson, 32, who welcomed her third baby Gigi Dawson Sarsfield in March, took to Instagram to make her feelings known as she shared a hilarious video.
Charlotte could be seen holding baby Gigi while wearing a pink dressing gown as she looks at herself and grabs her stomach, lip syncing to 'Oh my god what is that.'
She then takes off the dressing gown so is just wearing her black bra and pants before starting to dance and lip syncing 'Oh it's a bad b***h.'
Charlotte captioned the snap: 'Just about to take me Makey off n get into bed .. and had a thought.
'When tw** heads ask me "Have you not lost weight yet?" She's only 4 months old for one, and secondly CHUFF OFF ….'
Charlotte Dawson hit back at cruel trolls who have been telling her to lose her post-partum weight in a new clip on Instagram on Sunday
The daughter of comedian Les Dawson, 32, who welcomed her third baby Gigi Dawson Sarsfield in March, took to Instagram to make her feelings known as she shared a hilarious video
Charlotte captioned the snap: 'Just about to take me Makey off n get into bed .. and had a thought'
Fellow reality star Lateysha Grace said: 'Sexy mama ! All you're kids are identical to each other too ! So cute ❤️❤️❤️❤️.'
Fans of the star shared supportive comments as they praised her for being an 'inspiration'.
They commented: 'U r literally the best female inspiration. When pregnant to post pregnancy and just normal life in general ❤️,';
'Imagine sending gross messages to this woman and she's there living a lovely life with three cute kids and dancing in her undies… what a queen,';
'Love this and you ❤️,'; 'Haters gunna hate Babes - your just perfect,';
'Normal post baby weight is a sign that your priority is looking after your babies & not worrying about your image. Well done mama, you're doing a Grand job!';
'Mines 4 years and I'm only losing the weight now cause I put myself on a diet! Sometimes we don't bounce back and thats okay. You're beautiful!';
'I bloody love it!! Go girl!! You should be so proud of that beautiful amazing body that grew 3 amazing beautiful babies!! Your are so genuine and real.! I love it!! Swit swoo!!xx,';
Charlotte could be seen holding baby Gigi while wearing a pink dressing gown as she looks at herself and grabs her stomach, lip syncing to 'Oh my god what is that'
She then takes off the dressing gown so is just wearing her black bra and pants before starting to dance and lip syncing 'Oh it's a bad b***h'
Fellow reality star Lateysha Grace said: 'Sexy mama ! All you're kids are identical to each other too ! So cute ❤️❤️❤️❤️'
Fans of the star shared supportive comments as they praised her for being an 'inspiration'
'I needed this so desperately. THANK YOU for this reminder!! I had my baby in March & I keep just beating myself up for not 'bouncing back' like everyone else.. but I've not given myself an ounce of grace or love, so thank you ❤️.'
It comes days after Charlotte took to social media to promote her Dawsylicious Tanning range amid her financial difficulties.
According to documents on Companies House, the reality star's business is facing a £88,000 tax bill and issued an appointment of voluntary liquidation in May.
Charlotte co-owns the wholesale clothing and footwear brand with her fiancé Matt Sarsfield. She is also known to have a separate tanning brand, Dawsylicious Tanning.
The star promoted the brand in the new clip, where she confidently danced in her garden in a bright two-piece.
Alongside the clip, she penned: 'Ps yes I know I’m chunkeh but funkeh but im appeh x this is your sign to show you to wear that damn bikini x.'
Charlotte and Matt managed to patch up their relationship last year after the news broke of the former rugby player's sexting scandal.
And now the couple, who share sons Noah, four, and Jude, 20 months and daughter Gigi, two months, must face their financial problems together.
Charlotte looked happier than ever as she took to Instagram on Friday in a yellow bikini as she embraced her post-baby figure
The mother-of-three took to social media to promote her Dawsylicious Tanning range amid her financial difficulties
Documents show the company has £15,000 in assets, reducing her debts to an estimated deficit of £73,300.
Since starting the business in May 2020, Dawsylicious has been issued three strike notices, the most recent being in April 2024.
Her accounts were due by February 29, 2024 and her confirmation statement was due on June 2, 2024. Both are marked as overdue.
Dawsylicious is Charlotte's only limited company listed on Companies House and is described as a wholesale of clothing and footwear.
She also has her separate tanning brand, Dawsylicious Tanning.
MailOnline contacted Charlotte's representatives for comment at the time.

argos_summary: Charlotte Dawson has responded to online trolls criticizing her post-partum weight gain after the birth of her third child, Gigi. The reality star shared a humorous video on Instagram, embracing her body and encouraging others to support her weight loss journey through her Belleh Blaster plan. Amidst her personal struggles, including financial difficulties with her tanning business, Dawson continues to promote body positivity and self-acceptance.
